about: Hi! I am Aslyn, a software engineer. I enjoy the boundless canvas and the colorful technique brush of the web world. I like to develop web pages that can communicate and interactive with people. Currently, I have focused on specialized development in React.js.
conversa-description: Conversa is a Real-time Poll Tool & Slides Editor. With Conversa, you can interact with your audience and collect feedbacks with ease and fun. Conversa can also show an instant diagram with audience responses.
hido-description: An one-page promotion site for a pomelo farm. With Gatsby to create static site without spending much time and have good SEO.
